name: Pocket Auto Chess
description: Pocket Auto chess is an official mobile service application made for chess players by Auto Chess. Check your game records, simulate a battle, a lineup or the synergies, use professional analysis tools, browse game community and catch the newest information and entertainment content about the game.  Features: Up-to-date News: Get the latest game news and exclusive game information, and discover the Drodo Isles with more diversified insight; Community: Exchange your anecdotes, thoughts and feelings with other chess players, get even closer to the official R&D team; Game Tools: Have a look at the most complete game database, get fully prepared with simulations, pieces information before the fight; Game Records: Need a better tutor? History may be the best, check your records, analyze them to reinforce yourself. You will be the Queen; Entertainment: Immerse yourself in fascinating photos and videos created by talent streamers all over the world; Tournaments: Have full vision of relative competitions, including lives, news and activities that you will never miss; Drodo and more, all in !  Need us for help? Go on the top left, tap your [Avatar] - [Settings] - [Feedback]
